FILE: cm517565v11.0.txt
DYAD: RWANDA - NAMIBIA/GERMAN W. AFRICA
RIVALRY: RIV1133
DISPUTE(S): MID4339 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20181003
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20181003

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID4339

TERRMID: MID4339 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID4339 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4339 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4339 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4339 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4339 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4339 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4339 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4339 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4339 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARLINK: MID4339 1 -- civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4339 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: MID4339 from Gibler 2018, this is the Second Congo War from 1998-2001, in which Rwanda (i) provided aid to rebels fighting against the DRC government and (ii) invaded part of DRC to assist. Namibia provided military assistance to the DRC government, pulling them into this MID against Rwanda. Coded civil war link because this was connected to civil war in DRC, outside this dyad. 

COUPMID: MID4339 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4339 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4339 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4339 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
